trans-unit.source: Clid is a command line app written in Python3 to manage your mp3 files’ ID3 tags. Unlike other tools, clid provides a graphical interface in the terminal to edit tags, much like the way cmus does for playing mp3 files in the terminal.
trans-unit.target: Clid是用Python3编写的命令行应用程序，用于管理mp3文件的ID3标签。与其他工具不同，clid在终端中提供了图形界面来编辑标签，就像cmus在终端中播放mp3文件一样。

trans-unit.source: Command line app based on ncurses to edit ID3 tags of mp3 files
trans-unit.target: 基于ncurses的命令行程序来编辑MP3文件的ID3标签。
有关更多详细信息，请参见主页。
